00013 // Arm parts
00014 #define ARM_GO          0
00015 #define ARM_WAIT        1
00016 
00017 #define ARM_MOVE_SPEED   10
00018 #define ARM_WAIT_TIME    8
00019 
00020 // Spark parts
00021 #define MORTIMER_SPARK_BASEFRAME        114
00022 
00023 #define MORTIMER_LEFT_ARM_X             5
00024 #define MORTIMER_RIGHT_ARM_X            17
00025 #define MORTIMER_ARMS_YSTART            7
00026 #define MORTIMER_ARMS_YEND              18
00027 
00028 #define ARMS_DESTROY_RATE        3
00029 
00030 #define MSPARK_IDLE              0
00031 #define MSPARK_DESTROYARMS       1
00032 
00033 #define SPARK_ANIMRATE          5
00034 
00035 // heart
00036 #define MORTIMER_HEART_BASEFRAME        146
00037 #define HEART_ANIMRATE                  4
00038 
00039 #define HEART_IDLE              0
00040 #define HEART_ZAPSRUNUP         1
00041 #define HEART_ZAPSRUNDOWN       2
00042 
00043 #define MORTIMER_MACHINE_YSTART         3
00044 #define MORTIMER_MACHINE_YEND           18
00045 #define MORTIMER_MACHINE_YENDNOLEGS     14
00046 
00047 #define MORTIMER_MACHINE_XSTART         8
00048 #define MORTIMER_MACHINE_XEND           17
00049 
00050 #define MACHINE_DESTROY_RATE            3
00051 #define MORTIMER_ZAPWAVESPACING        50
00052 #define MORTIMER_NUMZAPWAVES             5
00053 
00054 #define ZAPSUP_NORMAL           0
00055 #define ZAPSUP_ABOUTTOFADEOUT   1
00056 
00057 // Legs
00058 #define LEG_GO          0
00059 #define LEG_WAIT        1
00060 
00061 #define LEFTLEG_MOVE_SPEED   15
00062 #define LEFTLEG_WAIT_TIME    36
00063 
00064 #define RIGHTLEG_MOVE_SPEED   20
00065 #define RIGHTLEG_WAIT_TIME    40

00068 int mortimer_surprisedcount = 0;
00069 
00070 CSectorEffector::CSectorEffector(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00071   std::vector<CPlayer>& Player, std::vector<CObject*>& Object, unsigned int se_type) :
00072 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_SECTOREFFECTOR),
00073 setype(se_type),
00074 timer(0),
00075 m_Player(Player),
00076 m_Object(Object)
00077 {
00078  inhibitfall = true;
00079 
00080  switch(setype)
00081  {
00082  case SE_MORTIMER_ARM:
00083   dir = DOWN;
00084   state = ARM_GO;
00085   break;
00086  case SE_MORTIMER_LEG_LEFT:
00087   dir = UP;
00088   state = LEG_GO;
00089   break;
00090  case SE_MORTIMER_LEG_RIGHT:
00091   dir = UP;
00092   state = LEG_GO;
00093   inhibitfall = 1;
00094   needinit = false;
00095   break;
00096  case SE_MORTIMER_SPARK:
00097   state = MSPARK_IDLE;
00098   frame = 0;
00099   canbezapped = true;
00100   break;
00101  case SE_MORTIMER_HEART:
00102   frame = 0;
00103   state = HEART_IDLE;
00104   inhibitfall = 1;
00105   canbezapped = 1;
00106   mortimer_surprisedcount = 0;
00107   break;
00108  case SE_MORTIMER_ZAPSUP:  break;
00109  case SE_MORTIMER_RANDOMZAPS:
00110   sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00111   counter = 0;
00112   break;
00113 
00114  default:
00115   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Invalid sector effector type %d", setype);
00116   break;
00117  }
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 void CSectorEffector::process()
00123 {
00124  switch(setype)
00125  {
00126  case SE_MORTIMER_ARM: se_mortimer_arm(); break;
00127  case SE_MORTIMER_LEG_LEFT: se_mortimer_leg_left(); break;
00128  case SE_MORTIMER_LEG_RIGHT: se_mortimer_leg_right(); break;
00129  case SE_MORTIMER_SPARK: se_mortimer_spark(); break;
00130  case SE_MORTIMER_HEART: se_mortimer_heart(); break;
00131  case SE_MORTIMER_ZAPSUP: se_mortimer_zapsup(); break;
00132  case SE_MORTIMER_RANDOMZAPS: se_mortimer_randomzaps(); break;
00133 
00134  default:
00135   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Invalid sector effector type %d", setype);
00136   break;
00137  }
00138 
00139 }
00140 
00141 void CSectorEffector::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00142 {
00143  if(hitdetect(theObject))
00144  {
00145   bool it_is_mortimer_machine = false;
00146 
00147   it_is_mortimer_machine = (setype == SE_MORTIMER_LEG_LEFT)
00148         || (setype == SE_MORTIMER_LEG_RIGHT)
00149         || (setype == SE_MORTIMER_ARM)
00150         || (setype == SE_MORTIMER_SPARK);
00151 
00152   if(it_is_mortimer_machine)
00153   {
00154    if (theObject.m_type == OBJ_PLAYER)
00155    {
00156     theObject.kill();
00157    }
00158   }
00159 
00160   if( ( setype == SE_MORTIMER_SPARK || setype == SE_MORTIMER_HEART ) &&
00161     HealthPoints>0 && theObject.m_type == OBJ_RAY )
00162   {
00163    HealthPoints--;
00164   }
00165  }
00166 }
00167 
00168 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_arm()
00169 {
00170  int mx,my;
00171 
00172  switch(state)
00173  {
00174  case ARM_GO:
00175   // vertical arm 618 620 619
00176   // pole 597
00177   // polka dot background 169
00178   if (timer > ARM_MOVE_SPEED)
00179   {
00180    mx = getXPosition() >> CSF;
00181    my = getYPosition() >> CSF;
00182 
00183    if (dir==DOWN)
00184    {
00185     // reached bottom?
00186     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my+3) == 471)
00187     {
00188      timer = 0;
00189      state = ARM_WAIT;
00190     }
00191     else
00192     {
00193      // add to the pole
00194      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my+1, 597, true);
00195      // create left side of pincher
00196      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1, my+1, 618, true);
00197      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1, my+2, 620, true);
00198      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1, my+3, 619, true);
00199      // create right side of pincher
00200      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1, my+1, 618, true);
00201      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1, my+2, 620, true);
00202      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1, my+3, 619, true);
00203      // erase the top of the pincher we don't need anymore
00204      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1, my, 169, true);
00205      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1, my, 169, true);
00206      moveDown(1<<CSF);
00207     }
00208    }
00209    else
00210    {  // arm going up
00211 
00212     // reached top?
00213     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my+1)==619)
00214     {
00215      timer = 0;
00216      state = ARM_WAIT;
00217     }
00218     else
00219     {
00220      // create left side of pincher
00221      mp_Map->changeTile(mx-1, my+1, 618);
00222      mp_Map->changeTile(mx-1, my+2, 620);
00223      mp_Map->changeTile(mx-1, my+3, 619);
00224      // create right side of pincher
00225      mp_Map->changeTile(mx+1, my+1, 618);
00226      mp_Map->changeTile(mx+1, my+2, 620);
00227      mp_Map->changeTile(mx+1, my+3, 619);
00228      // erase the bottom of the pincher we don't need anymore
00229      mp_Map->changeTile(mx-1, my+4, 169);
00230      mp_Map->changeTile(mx+1, my+4, 169);
00231      // erase the pole
00232      mp_Map->changeTile(mx, my+2, 169);
00233 
00234      moveUp(1<<CSF);
00235     }
00236    }
00237    timer = 0;
00238   }
00239   else timer++;
00240   break;
00241  case ARM_WAIT:
00242   if (timer > ARM_WAIT_TIME)
00243   {
00244    if (dir==DOWN)
00245    {
00246     dir = UP;
00247     moveUp(2<<CSF);
00248    }
00249    else
00250    {
00251     dir = DOWN;
00252     moveDown(1<<CSF);
00253    }
00254 
00255    state = ARM_GO;
00256    timer = 0;
00257   }
00258   else timer++;
00259   break;
00260  }
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_spark()
00265 {
00266  int x,mx;
00267 
00268  switch(state)
00269  {
00270  case MSPARK_IDLE:
00271   sprite = MORTIMER_SPARK_BASEFRAME + frame;
00272 
00273   if (timer > SPARK_ANIMRATE)
00274   {
00275    frame++;
00276    if (frame > 3) frame = 0;
00277    timer = 0;
00278   }
00279   else timer++;
00280 
00281   if (HealthPoints <= 0)
00282   {
00283    set_mortimer_surprised(true);
00284    g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CVibrate(200));
00285    mp_Map->redrawAt(this->x>>CSF, this->y>>CSF);
00286 
00287    // if there are any sparks left, destroy the spark,
00288    // else destroy mortimer's arms
00289    for(std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = m_Object.begin()
00290      ; obj != m_Object.end() ; obj++)
00291    {
00292     if((*obj)->m_type==OBJ_SECTOREFFECTOR)
00293     {
00294      CSectorEffector& SE = dynamic_cast<CSectorEffector&>(**obj);
00295 
00296      if (SE.setype==SE_MORTIMER_SPARK &&
00297        SE.exists)
00298      {
00299       if (SE.m_index!=m_index)
00300       { // other sparks still exist
00301        setype = SE_MORTIMER_RANDOMZAPS;
00302        needinit = true;
00303        return;
00304       }
00305      }
00306     }
00307    }
00308    // keen just destroyed the last spark
00309 
00310    // destroy mortimer's arms
00311    sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00312 
00313    // destroy the sector effectors controlling his arms
00314    for(std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = m_Object.begin()
00315      ; obj != m_Object.end() ; obj++)
00316    {
00317     if((*obj)->m_type==OBJ_SECTOREFFECTOR)
00318     {
00319      CSectorEffector& SE=dynamic_cast<CSectorEffector&>(**obj);
00320      if (SE.setype==SE_MORTIMER_ARM)
00321       SE.exists = false;
00322     }
00323    }
00324    // go into a state where we'll destroy mortimer's arms
00325    state = MSPARK_DESTROYARMS;
00326    my = MORTIMER_ARMS_YSTART;
00327    timer = 0;
00328   }
00329   break;
00330  case MSPARK_DESTROYARMS:
00331   if (!timer)
00332   {
00333    g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, getXPosition());
00334    for(x=0;x<3;x++)
00335    {
00336     mx = MORTIMER_LEFT_ARM_X+x;
00337     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my) != 169)
00338     {
00339      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my, 169, true);
00340      // spawn a ZAP! or a ZOT!
00341      CRay *newobject = new CRay(mp_Map, ((mx<<4)+4)<<STC, my<<4<<STC, DOWN);
00342      newobject->state = CRay::RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00343      newobject->inhibitfall = true;
00344      newobject->needinit = false;
00345      m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00346     }
00347 
00348     mx = MORTIMER_RIGHT_ARM_X+x;
00349     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my) != 169)
00350     {
00351      mp_Map->setTile(mx, my, 169, true);
00352      // spawn a ZAP! or a ZOT!
00353      CRay *newobject = new CRay(mp_Map, ((mx<<4)+4)<<STC, my<<4<<STC, DOWN);
00354      newobject->state = CRay::RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00355      newobject->inhibitfall = true;
00356      newobject->needinit = false;
00357      m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00358     }
00359 
00360    }
00361    timer = ARMS_DESTROY_RATE;
00362    my++;
00363    if (my > MORTIMER_ARMS_YEND)
00364    {
00365     exists = false;
00366     set_mortimer_surprised(false);
00367    }
00368   }
00369   else timer--;
00370   break;
00371  }
00372 }
00373 
00374 
00375 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_heart()
00376 {
00377  int x;
00378 
00379  switch(state)
00380  {
00381  case HEART_IDLE:
00382   sprite = MORTIMER_HEART_BASEFRAME + frame;
00383 
00384   if (timer > HEART_ANIMRATE)
00385   {
00386    frame ^= 1;
00387    timer = 0;
00388   }
00389   else timer++;
00390 
00391   if (HealthPoints <= 0)
00392   {
00393    sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00394    set_mortimer_surprised(true);
00395 
00396    // destroy Mortimer's machine
00397    g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CVibrate(10000));
00398 
00399    // kill all enemies
00400    for(std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = m_Object.begin()
00401      ; obj != m_Object.end() ; obj++)
00402    {
00403     if((*obj)->m_type==OBJ_SECTOREFFECTOR)
00404     {
00405      CSectorEffector& SE=dynamic_cast<CSectorEffector&>(**obj);
00406      if(SE.setype == SE_MORTIMER_HEART ) continue;
00407      else SE.exists = false;
00408     }
00409     else
00410     {
00411      (*obj)->kill();
00412      (*obj)->exists = false;
00413     }
00414    }
00415 
00416    set_mortimer_surprised(true);
00417    // have waves of zaps run up mortimer's machine
00418    timer = 0;
00419    state = HEART_ZAPSRUNUP;
00420    counter = 0;
00421   }
00422   break;
00423 
00424  case HEART_ZAPSRUNUP:
00425   if (!timer)
00426   { // spawn another wave of zaps
00427    int x = getXPosition();
00428    int y = getYPosition();
00429 
00430    CSectorEffector *newobject = new CSectorEffector(mp_Map, x, y,
00431      m_Player, m_Object, SE_MORTIMER_ZAPSUP);
00432    newobject->my = MORTIMER_MACHINE_YEND;
00433    newobject->timer = 0;
00434    newobject->destroytiles = 0;
00435    newobject->state = ZAPSUP_NORMAL;
00436    newobject->hasbeenonscreen = false;
00437 
00438    timer = MORTIMER_ZAPWAVESPACING;
00439    if (counter > MORTIMER_NUMZAPWAVES)
00440    {
00441     newobject->destroytiles = true;
00442     exists = false;
00443    }
00444    else counter++;
00445 
00446    m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00447   }
00448   else timer--;
00449   break;
00450  case HEART_ZAPSRUNDOWN:
00451   if (!timer)
00452   {
00453    for(x=MORTIMER_MACHINE_XSTART;x<MORTIMER_MACHINE_XEND;x++)
00454    {
00455     // delete the tile
00456     mp_Map->setTile(x,my,169);
00457     // spawn a ZAP! or a ZOT!
00458     CRay *newobject = new CRay(mp_Map, ((x<<4)+4)<<STC, my<<4<<STC, DOWN);
00459     newobject->state = CRay::RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00460     newobject->inhibitfall = true;
00461     newobject->needinit = false;
00462     m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00463    }
00464 
00465    timer = MACHINE_DESTROY_RATE;
00466    if (my > MORTIMER_MACHINE_YEND)
00467    {
00468     exists = false;
00469    }
00470    else my++;
00471   }
00472   else timer--;
00473   break;
00474  }
00475 }
00476 
00477 #define TIME_AFTER_DESTROY_BEFORE_FADEOUT       500
00478 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_zapsup()
00479 {
00480  int x;
00481 
00482  if (!timer)
00483  {
00484   if (state==ZAPSUP_ABOUTTOFADEOUT)
00485   {
00486    m_Player[0].level_done = LEVEL_DONE_FADEOUT;
00487    exists = false;
00488    return;
00489   }
00490 
00491   g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, getXPosition());
00492   for(x=MORTIMER_MACHINE_XSTART;x<MORTIMER_MACHINE_XEND;x++)
00493   {
00494    // spawn a ZAP! or a ZOT!
00495    CRay *newobject = new CRay(mp_Map, ((x<<4)+4)<<STC, my<<4<<STC, DOWN);
00496    newobject->state = CRay::RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00497    newobject->inhibitfall = true;
00498    newobject->needinit = false;
00499    m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00500 
00501    if (destroytiles)
00502    {
00503     // delete the tile
00504     mp_Map->changeTile(x,my,169);
00505    }
00506   }
00507 
00508   timer = MACHINE_DESTROY_RATE;
00509   if (my <= MORTIMER_MACHINE_YSTART)
00510   {
00511    if (destroytiles)
00512    {
00513     // last wave, prepare to initiate level fadeout
00514     timer = TIME_AFTER_DESTROY_BEFORE_FADEOUT;
00515     state = ZAPSUP_ABOUTTOFADEOUT;
00516 
00517     // if a keen is standing on that machine, make him fall!
00518     std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator player = m_Player.begin();
00519     for(; player != m_Player.end() ; player++)
00520     {
00521      player->pfalling = true;
00522     }
00523 
00524     return;
00525    }
00526    else
00527    {
00528     exists = false;
00529     timer = 0;
00530    }
00531   }
00532   else my--;
00533  }
00534  else timer--;
00535 }
00536 
00537 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_leg_left()
00538 {
00539  int mx,my;
00540 
00541  switch(state)
00542  {
00543  case LEG_GO:
00544   // leg tiles 621 623 622
00545   // pole 597
00546   // polka dot background 169
00547   // bottom marker for leg 430
00548   // top marker for leg 420
00549   if (timer > LEFTLEG_MOVE_SPEED)
00550   {
00551    mx = getXPosition() >> CSF;
00552    my = getYPosition() >> CSF;
00553 
00554    if (dir==DOWN)
00555    {
00556     // reached bottom?
00557     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my+1) == 430)
00558     {
00559      timer = 0;
00560      state = LEG_WAIT;
00561      g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_FOOTSLAM, PLAY_NOW, getXPosition());
00562     }
00563     else
00564     {
00565      // create the leg
00566      mp_Map->setTile(mx-3,my+1,621, true);
00567      mp_Map->setTile(mx-2,my+1,623, true);
00568      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1,my+1,623, true);
00569      mp_Map->setTile(mx-0,my+1,622, true);
00570      // erase the tiles above us that used to be the leg
00571      mp_Map->setTile(mx-3,my,169, true);
00572      mp_Map->setTile(mx-2,my,169, true);
00573      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1,my,169, true);
00574      mp_Map->setTile(mx-0,my,597, true);         // add to pole
00575 
00576      moveDown(1<<CSF);
00577     }
00578    }
00579    else
00580    {  // leg going up
00581 
00582     // reached top?
00583     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my-1) == 420)
00584     {
00585      timer = 0;
00586      state = LEG_WAIT;
00587     }
00588     else
00589     {
00590      // create the leg
00591      mp_Map->setTile(mx-3,my-1,621, true);
00592      mp_Map->setTile(mx-2,my-1,623, true);
00593      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1,my-1,623, true);
00594      mp_Map->setTile(mx-0,my-1,622, true);
00595      // erase the tiles beneath us that used to be the leg
00596      mp_Map->setTile(mx-3,my,169, true);
00597      mp_Map->setTile(mx-2,my,169, true);
00598      mp_Map->setTile(mx-1,my,169, true);
00599      mp_Map->setTile(mx-0,my,169, true);
00600 
00601      moveUp(1<<CSF);
00602     }
00603    }
00604    timer = 0;
00605   }
00606   else timer++;
00607   break;
00608  case LEG_WAIT:
00609   if (timer > LEFTLEG_WAIT_TIME)
00610   {
00611    if (dir==DOWN)
00612    {
00613     dir = UP;
00614    }
00615    else
00616    {
00617     dir = DOWN;
00618    }
00619 
00620    state = LEG_GO;
00621    timer = 0;
00622   }
00623   else timer++;
00624   break;
00625  }
00626 }
00627 
00628 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_leg_right()
00629 {
00630  int mx,my;
00631 
00632  switch(state)
00633  {
00634  case LEG_GO:
00635   // leg tiles 621 623 622
00636   // pole 597
00637   // polka dot background 169
00638   // bottom marker for leg 430
00639   // top marker for leg 420
00640   if (timer > RIGHTLEG_MOVE_SPEED)
00641   {
00642    mx = getXPosition() >> CSF;
00643    my = getYPosition() >> CSF;
00644 
00645    if (dir==DOWN)
00646    {
00647     // reached bottom?
00648     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my+1) == 430)
00649     {
00650      timer = 0;
00651      state = LEG_WAIT;
00652      g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_FOOTSLAM, PLAY_NOW, getXPosition());
00653     }
00654     else
00655     {
00656      // create the leg
00657      mp_Map->setTile(mx+3,my+1,622, true);
00658      mp_Map->setTile(mx+2,my+1,623, true);
00659      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1,my+1,623, true);
00660      mp_Map->setTile(mx+0,my+1,621, true);
00661      // erase the tiles above us that used to be the leg
00662      mp_Map->setTile(mx+3,my,169, true);
00663      mp_Map->setTile(mx+2,my,169, true);
00664      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1,my,169, true);
00665      mp_Map->setTile(mx+0,my,597, true);         // add to pole
00666 
00667      moveDown(1<<CSF);
00668     }
00669    }
00670    else
00671    {  // leg going up
00672 
00673     // reached top?
00674     if (mp_Map->at(mx, my-1) == 420)
00675     {
00676      timer = 0;
00677      state = LEG_WAIT;
00678     }
00679     else
00680     {
00681      // create the leg
00682      mp_Map->setTile(mx+3,my-1,622, true);
00683      mp_Map->setTile(mx+2,my-1,623, true);
00684      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1,my-1,623, true);
00685      mp_Map->setTile(mx+0,my-1,621, true);
00686      // erase the tiles beneath us that used to be the leg
00687      mp_Map->setTile(mx+3,my,169, true);
00688      mp_Map->setTile(mx+2,my,169, true);
00689      mp_Map->setTile(mx+1,my,169, true);
00690      mp_Map->setTile(mx+0,my,169, true);
00691 
00692      moveUp(1<<CSF);
00693     }
00694    }
00695    timer = 0;
00696   }
00697   else timer++;
00698   break;
00699  case LEG_WAIT:
00700   if (timer > RIGHTLEG_WAIT_TIME)
00701   {
00702    if (dir==DOWN)
00703    {
00704     dir = UP;
00705    }
00706    else
00707    {
00708     dir = DOWN;
00709    }
00710 
00711    state = LEG_GO;
00712    timer = 0;
00713   }
00714   else timer++;
00715   break;
00716  }
00717 }
00718 
00719 #define NUM_RANDOM_ZAPS         30
00720 #define TIME_BETWEEN_ZAPS       2
00721 void CSectorEffector::se_mortimer_randomzaps()
00722 {
00723  int x,y;
00724 
00725  if (!timer)
00726  {
00727   x = rand()%((MORTIMER_MACHINE_XEND*16)-(MORTIMER_MACHINE_XSTART*16))+(MORTIMER_MACHINE_XSTART*16);
00728   y = rand()%((MORTIMER_MACHINE_YENDNOLEGS*16)-(MORTIMER_MACHINE_YSTART*16))+(MORTIMER_MACHINE_YSTART*16);
00729 
00730   // spawn a ZAP! or a ZOT!
00731   CRay *newobject = new CRay(mp_Map,x<<CSF, y<<CSF, RIGHT );
00732   newobject->state = CRay::RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00733   newobject->inhibitfall = true;
00734   newobject->needinit = false;
00735   m_Object.push_back(newobject);
00736 
00737   timer = TIME_BETWEEN_ZAPS;
00738   if (counter > NUM_RANDOM_ZAPS)
00739   {
00740    set_mortimer_surprised(false);
00741    exists=false;
00742   }
00743   else counter++;
00744  }
00745  else timer--;
00746 }
00747 
00748 void CSectorEffector::set_mortimer_surprised(bool yes)
00749 {
00750  if (yes)
00751  {
00752   mortimer_surprisedcount++;
00753  }
00754  else
00755  {
00756   if (mortimer_surprisedcount>0) mortimer_surprisedcount--;
00757  }
00758 
00759  if (mortimer_surprisedcount)
00760  {
00761   //12,6 -> 610 -- give mortimer his "surprised" face
00762   // deanimate mortimer's hands
00763   mp_Map->setTile(12,6,610, true);
00764   mp_Map->setTile(11,6,613, true);
00765   mp_Map->setTile(13,6,615, true);
00766  }
00767  else
00768  {
00769   // give mortimer his normal face again
00770   mp_Map->setTile(12,6,607, true);
00771   mp_Map->setTile(11,6,613, true);
00772   mp_Map->setTile(13,6,616, true);
00773  }
00774 }
